```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)


spending_1 <- read.csv("2020_dems_fec_part1_spending.csv")
  
spending_2 <- read.csv("2020_dems_fec_part2_spending.csv")

# Merges both together vertically

spending <- rbind(spending_1,spending_2) %>% 
  select(committee_name, recipient_name, recipient_state, disbursement_description, disbursement_date, 
         disbursement_amount, recipient_city)
```
